meanings.sent1: The balky horse refused to move forward.
meanings.sent2: The old car's balky engine made it hard to start.
meanings.sent3: The balky computer decided to take a break right before the deadline.
meanings.sent4: Her balky attitude towards change slowed down the project.
meanings.sent5: The balky lock on the door stuck stubbornly, keeping us outside.

meanings.sent1: The balky child wouldn't listen to his parents.
meanings.sent2: The balky dog ignored all commands to come inside.
meanings.sent3: The balky cat pretended not to hear its owner calling.
meanings.sent4: The balky student kept ignoring the teacher's instructions.
meanings.sent5: The balky machine rebelled against any attempts to control it.

meanings.definition: Stubbornly resistant or difficult to manage
meanings.sent1: The balky door handle always got stuck.
meanings.sent2: The balky printer constantly jammed paper.
meanings.sent3: The balky clock decided to run backwards just for fun.
meanings.sent4: The balky customer made it hard for the salesperson to assist.
meanings.sent5: The balky puzzle piece refused to fit no matter how hard she tried.
